Queries.getNumberGamesPlayedByUserId: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gamerequest g JOIN riftergame r ON g.session_id = r.id WHERE riftee_id = ? AND accepted = true AND r.game_time < current_timestamp
Queries.getGameRequestsAndGameInfoByUserId: SELECT * FROM gamerequest g JOIN riftergame r ON g.session_id = r.id WHERE g.riftee_id = ?;
Queries.getGameRequestsAndGameInfoByUserIdAndAcc: SELECT * FROM gamerequest g JOIN riftergame r ON g.session_id = r.id WHERE g.riftee_id = ? AND accepted = ?
Queries.getBroadcastNotificationsById: SELECT n.id, user_id, notification_type, notification_content, game_id, created_time, creator_id, us.first_name, us.last_name, us.is_private, us.is_suspended, us.profile_picture_path, us.rift_tag, us.riftee_rating, us.rifter_rating FROM usertable u JOIN following f ON u.id = f.follower_id JOIN notification n ON f.following_id = n.creator_id WHERE u.id = 2 AND n.notification_type = 'New Game';
Queries.getRifterGameAndHostByGameId: SELECT * FROM riftergame r JOIN usertable u ON r.host_id = u.id WHERE r.id = ?
Queries.getGamePlayersByGameId: SELECT u.* FROM gamerequest g JOIN usertable u ON g.riftee_id = u.id WHERE g.session_id = ?
